title: Ticket #3116: [proposal] Condor should try harder to obtain an FQDN.
description: It would appear (see parent and sibling tickets) that Condor doesn't much like operating without an FQDN (at least with DNS turned on). I would suggest, then, that Condor try harder to obtain a FQDN; for instance, doing a reverse-lookup on its chosen IP address would have obtained the right answer on exec-13.
creator: tlmiller
